name: AI Agents Team
description: A comprehensive team of specialized AI agents for React Native/Expo application development

agents.name: CollaborativeAgent
agents.description: Orchestrates communication between expert agents for optimized workflows

agents.name: ProductManagerAgent
agents.description: Drives clarity, prioritization, and measurable outcomes

agents.name: ArchitectAgent
agents.description: Expert in system architecture, technical design, and architectural decisions

agents.name: BackendExpertAgent
agents.description: Expert in backend services, APIs, databases, and server-side development

agents.name: DesignUXExpertAgent
agents.description: Expert in mobile-first design, user experience, and accessibility

agents.name: FrontEndExpertAgent
agents.description: Expert in React Native/Expo development and frontend implementation

agents.name: ReusabilityExpertAgent
agents.description: Expert in DRY principles, component reusability, and code consistency

agents.name: LocalizationServicesOptimizer
agents.description: Expert in location services and geolocation optimization

agents.name: PerformanceOptimizer
agents.description: Expert in performance optimization, memory management, and rendering efficiency

agents.name: InnovationExpertAgent
agents.description: Expert in creative ideation, competitive analysis, and strategic innovation

agents.name: AI/ML Expert Agent
agents.description: Expert in AI/ML integration, intelligent features, and predictive capabilities

agents.name: Security Expert Agent
agents.description: Expert in security, privacy, encryption, and compliance

agents.name: TasksAgent
agents.description: Expert in tracking, managing, and analyzing improvement initiatives

uiComponentDevelopment.description: Pure UI components with no location or performance critical requirements

locationHeavyFeature.description: Features heavily dependent on location services and geolocation

performanceCriticalFeature.description: Features with high performance requirements or complex rendering

componentRefactoring.description: Refactoring existing components for better architecture

locationServiceOptimization.description: Optimizing location services and geolocation features

comprehensiveFeatureDevelopment.description: Complex features requiring all agent perspectives

aiPoweredFeature.description: Features requiring AI/ML integration and intelligent capabilities

securityCriticalFeature.description: Features requiring advanced security and privacy protection

backendHeavyFeature.description: Features heavily dependent on backend services, APIs, and server-side processing

innovationAndStrategy.description: Innovation-focused tasks requiring creative ideation and strategic thinking

improvementTrackingAndManagement.description: Tasks focused on tracking, managing, and analyzing improvement initiatives

examples: CollaborativeAgent: Develop a new user profile component
CollaborativeAgent: Optimize location services for our app
DesignUXExpertAgent: Analyze UX for our login screen
PerformanceOptimizer: Optimize our list rendering performance
